clinical_study.brief_title: Gated Radiotherapy in Left Sided Breast Cancer Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Study on the Need of Gated (GAT) Radiotherapy in Left Sided Breast Cancer Patients Treated at the Technical University Munich (TUM) - the GATTUM Protocol

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the need of respiratory gated radiotherapy in left sided breast cancer patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of distance from chestwall to the heart
primary_outcome.description: Rigid and non-rigid measurement of distance from chestwall to the heart.

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of distance from the heart to the mammary gland
primary_outcome.description: Rigid and non-rigid measurement of distance from the heart to the mammary gland

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- left sided breast cancer patients treated with breast conserving surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients treated with mastectomy
- patients with positive lymph nodes

overall_official.affiliation: Klinikum rechts der Isar, department of Radiation oncology
